TunableTuple.name: FTUE_TUNABLES
TunableTuple.description: Tunables relating to the FTUE tutorial mode.

TunableList.name: disable_ui_elements
TunableList.description: Disable one or more UI elements during a phase of the tutorial, denoted by the starting and ending tips.

TunableTuple.description: Defines a set of UI elements to be disabled during a range of tips.

TunableList.name: elements
TunableList.description: List of UI elements to disable. Note that not all elements can be disabled.

Tunable.name: end_tip
Tunable.description: When this tip becomes active or is satisfied, the target elements will become re-enabled.

Tunable.name: reason
Tunable.description: The reason the element has been disabled, usually displayed as a tooltip.

Tunable.name: start_tip
Tunable.description: When this tip becomes active or is satisfied, the target elements will become disabled.

Tunable.name: ftue_aspiration_category
Tunable.description: A reference to an aspiration category which is used in cas for the ftue flow

Tunable.name: start_house_description
Tunable.description: A reference to the HouseDescription resource to load into in FTUE
